summary:
AT&T is a major American company that provides phone and internet services. It was once known as American Telephone and Telegraph Company and had a big impact on the U.S. phone system. Over time, it grew through mergers and changes, becoming a huge telecommunications company.

In the past, AT&T had a monopoly on phone services. It started as a small company in 1878 and eventually became a large corporation. After some legal issues, it split into smaller companies but later merged again, forming the modern AT&T. They also bought Time Warner and became a media giant before selling it. Today, AT&T is one of the top telecom companies worldwide.
title: AT&T
